summary: Godzilla battles an irradiated Ankylosaur and destroys Osaka in the process.
cast: Hiroshi Koizumi|Setsuko Wakayama|Minoru Chiaki|Takashi Shimura|Masao Shimizu|Seijirô Onda|Sônosuke Sawamura|Yoshio Tsuchiya|Mayuri Mokushô|Minosuke Yamada|Yukio Kasama|Senkichi Ômura|Ren Yamamoto|Shin Ôtomo|Shirô Tsuchiya|Takeo Oikawa|Sôkichi Maki|Shôichi Hirose|Shin Yoshida|Junpei Natsuki|Teruko Mita|Katsumi Tezuka|Haruo Nakajima|Miyoko Hoshino|Toku Ihara|Takuzô Kumagai|Marvin Miller|Tadao Nakamaru|Hideo Shibuya|Shigemi Sunagawa|Masaaki Tachibana|Kôji Uno|Paul Frees|Keye Luke|George Takei
title: El rey de los monstruos
